content: a gorgeous flower motif combines with soft color gradients to make this crochet shawl a pretty addition to your wardrobe stitched in caron colorama halo o go you ll do single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet front post and more on this engaging pattern that s sure to keep your interest it s beautiful as designed but any gorgeous color would create a similar effect with no sizing to fuss over it s a please-all gift for anyone on your list yarn for model caron® colorama halo o go™ 8 oz/227 g 440 yds/208 m lavender frost 28011 3 o gos
